title: The Writer's Almanac - Thursday, December 17, 2020
description: On this day in 1790, workers who were doing some repairs unearthed the Aztec Sun Stone in Mexico City.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: On this day in 1790, workers who were doing some repairs unearthed the Aztec Sun Stone in Mexico City.
